info.description:
====
dcaf
====

Scripts and modules for various bioinformatics tasks, including:

- NGS and genomic feature analysis
- Text mining
- Gene expression analysis
- Functional genomics

Documentation
=============

See http://wrenlab.bitbucket.org/dcaf/

Contributions, Bug Reports, & Feedback
======================================

Are welcomed. Please use the Issue Tracker.

License 
=======

AGPL v3
info.name: dcaf
info.summary: Utilities for genome analysis, expression analysis, and text mining used by the Wren Lab at the Oklahoma Medical Research Foundation.
